column5: Looks like weather has finally stabilized and water levels are way up. Anyone have a current report on fish location? Have they moved off shorelines and onto mid lake basin structure and traditional summer patterns? Or are they still really scattered? Water temps? Also interested in smallies and muskies . . . Heading out for first ever trip to Lac Seul: Lost Island Lodge out of Hudson on Sunday. Promise to provide a full report on my return, and maybe even during the week. Thanks, Bill
